site.name: ***Note***
site.about: Please confirm the writeup from your respected teachers before you write them.

site.name: Group A 1
site.about: Implementation of following spoofing assignments using C++ multicore Programming a) IP Spoofing b) Web spoofing.

site.name: Group A 2
site.about: A fire is to be detected using relevant wireless sensor network installed in a remote location to communicate the data to the central server for the monitoring purpose and detection of the fire. Write a program to implement the system using WSN and Different data communication strategies/ algorithms (at least two) to compare the reliability of the data received and efficient timing. Use of Fort Forwarding/Tunneling Protocol is expected.

site.name: Group A 3
site.about: Write a computer forensic application program in Java/Python/C++ for Recovering Deleted Files and Deleted Partitions.

site.name: Group A 4
site.about: A person on a nearby road is trying to enter into a WiFi network by trying to crack the Password to use the IP Printer resource; write a program in Java/Python/C++ to detect such attempt and prohibit the access. Develop the necessary scenario by Using an IEEE 802.11, configure a Wi-Fi adapter and Access Point.

site.name: Group A 5
site.about: Write a program to implement Pulse Code Modulation Technique to transfer the data to other computer.

site.name: Group A 6
site.about: Write a program in C++ /Python to analyze email header.

site.name: Group B 1
site.about: Develop a GUI and write a Java/Pythn/C++ program to monitor Network Forensics, Investigating Logs and Investigating Network Traffic.

site.name: Group B 2
site.about: Write a program in Python for Investigating Wireless Attacks using Multi-core programming.

site.name: Group B 3
site.about: Write a program in Python for Investigating Web Attacks. Finding originator's IP, Subnet Mask and Default gateway where a Web Server is connected using Optical Router.

site.name: Group B 5
site.about: Write a program in C++ for Tracking Emails and Investigating Email Crimes.

site.name: Group B 6
site.about: Install and use Android Mobile Forensics Open Source Tools.

site.name: Group B 7
site.about: Write a program to Implement a packet sniffing tool in C++/Java/Python.

site.name: Group B 8
site.about: Write a program in C++ to implement to identify DOS attack on a wireless cluster of servers.

site.name: Group B 9
site.about: Install and use open source tools to Identifying various types of WiFi attacks. Write a C++/ Java/Python program to identify atleast one such attack.

site.name: Group B 13
site.about: Write a program to Implement a packet sniffing tool in C++.

site.name: Group C 2
site.about: Implement a program to generate and verify CAPTCHA image.
